statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sales_amount > 1000
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sales_amount FROM SalesData WHERE product_name LIKE 'Ap%'
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT product_name, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 5000
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sales_amount FROM SalesData WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%' AND sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_date FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(sale_id) AS total_sales, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date > '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM historical_sales;
SELECT sales_id, total_sales, date FROM historical_sales ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM sales_items WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT sales_id, date, total_sales FROM historical_sales WHERE total_sales > 5000;
SELECT item_id, item_name, price FROM sales_items ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_sales WHERE total_sales > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT hs.date, si.item_name, si.quantity, si.price FROM historical_sales hs JOIN sales_items si ON hs.sales_id = si.sales_id WHERE hs.date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY si.quantity DESC

SELECT hs.date, SUM(si.quantity) AS total_quantity, SUM(si.price) AS total_revenue FROM historical_sales hs JOIN sales_items si ON hs.sales_id = si.sales_id GROUP BY hs.date HAVING total_revenue > 5000 ORDER BY total_quantity ASC
SELECT hs.date, AVG(si.price) AS avg_price FROM historical_sales hs JOIN sales_items si ON hs.sales_id = si.sales_id GROUP BY hs.date HAVING avg_price > 50 ORDER BY hs.date ASC

SELECT hs.date, COUNT(si.item_id) AS num_items_sold FROM historical_sales hs LEFT JOIN sales_items si ON hs.sales_id = si.sales_id GROUP BY hs.date HAVING num_items_sold > 3 ORDER BY num_items_sold DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT id, date, prediction FROM sales_trends ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT product_id, sum(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT category, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products GROUP BY category ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 500 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products GROUP BY category ORDER BY category;
SELECT date, total_sales, prediction FROM sales_trends WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY prediction DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, product_id, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE product_id = 5 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM products p INNER JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales ORDER BY sale_amount ASC, sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_history WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE product_id = 3 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT s.sale_id, s.sale_date, p.product_name, s.sale_amount FROM sales s INNER JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.category_id = 2 ORDER BY s.sale_date ASC;

SELECT s.sale_id, s.sale_date, p.product_name, c.category_name, s.sale_amount FROM sales s INNER JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id INNER JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id ORDER BY c.category_name, s.sale_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount, MIN(sale_amount) AS min_sale_amount, MAX(sale_amount) AS max_sale_amount FROM sales;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM order_details GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT od.order_id, p.product_name, od.quantity, od.unit_price FROM order_details od JOIN products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id WHERE od.quantity > 5;
